author: Katie and Giancarlo Caldesi
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Melt the butter in a saucepan, but do not let it brown. Mix together the crushed amaretti biscuits, the melted butter, honey and a dash of vin santo in a bowl. Place a heaped teaspoon of the mixture onto the flat side of each of the peach halves and place on a baking tray. Sprinkle with demerara sugar and drizzle with more honey and vin santo. Bake in the oven for 15-30 minutes until golden. Serve.
ingredients: 50g/2oz butter ,  12 amaretti biscuits, crushed,  2 tbsp honey, plus extra for drizzling,  good dash vin santo, or similar sweet dessert wine, plus extra for drizzling,  4 peaches, halved and stones removed,  demerara sugar, to sprinkle
